tool_description: Flight data API for travel, hospitality, or aviation applications, researchers, small teams, and individual developers.
name: AeroDataBox
title: AeroDataBox

api_list.name: (BETA) Aircraft image recognition
api_list.description:
**What aircrafts are depicted on this photo?**

This endpoint recognizes aircrafts on uploaded image and returns information about all detected aircrafts. It is based on computer vision technology and therefore results may be imprecise. It relies on detecting aircrafts' registrations and, once detected, attempting to match these registration with records in aircrafts database.

Returns: Data about found and recognized aircrafts.

parameters.name: photo
parameters.description: Image containing aircraft. It should be image-type file (JPEG, PNG or BMP).  To improve results:  ensure that aircraft registration is as much as possible visible on the image; other inscriptions are visible as least as possible or absent on the image (although algorithm strives to filter these out as much as possible, false results are still possible).

utterances.utterance: Can you identify the aircraft in this JPEG image?
What aircraft is shown in this PNG file?
Please recognize the aircraft in this BMP picture.
Identify the aircrafts in this uploaded image.
Can you tell me which aircrafts are in this photo?
What type of aircraft is depicted in this image file?
Recognize the aircraft in this JPEG photo.
What aircrafts can you detect in this PNG image?
Please identify the aircrafts in this BMP file.
Can you recognize the aircraft in this picture?

api_list.name: Create web-hook subscription
api_list.description: Creates a webhook subscription on a subject (e.g. flight by number or by airport code). Returns information about the created subscription. Subscription ID contained in it can be used to refresh or remove it.

parameters.name: subjectId
